abstract: The president of the European Central Bank, Jean-Claude Trichet, offered a somewhat more optimistic assessment of the euro zone economy Thursday and said that bank stress tests in July were “an important step forward in restoring market confidence.”
snippet: The president of the European Central Bank, Jean-Claude Trichet, offered a somewhat more optimistic assessment of the euro zone economy Thursday and said that bank stress tests in July were “an important step forward in restoring market confidence...
lead_paragraph: The president of the European Central Bank, Jean-Claude Trichet, offered a somewhat more optimistic assessment of the euro zone economy Thursday and said that bank stress tests in July were “an important step forward in restoring market confidence.”

headline.main: Trichet Sees Reasons for Optimism in Europe
